page.title: 16ABOUT HOME LIFE
page.content: Residents of{Higham-on-the-Hill}come from different parts of the country making a variety of accents-the local dialects are dying out. There are no organised spectator sports.Some people like gardening.Most {homes}have modern appliances-many have microwave cookers.A lot of convenience food is bought.Older people make jam,bottle or freeze fruit-most younger people not interested.A few make wine and beer.{Family pets}are mainly cats and dogs-well controlled. {Electricity and water}are available in the village-not{gas.}Most homes have {TV }some video. { }There is no{resident policeman}but a community policewoman + 2 constables visit when required.There are two postal deliveries and collections daily.1 public telephone-most homes have private tel.Mobile library visits
